title: Cilantro Lime Cucumber Salad
directions: In a small bowl, combine lime juice, minced garlic, red pepper flakes, sea salt, and pepper. Add the olive oil a little at a time, continuously stirring with a whisk. Set aside. Add sliced cucumbers to the bowl, and stir to evenly coat all cucumber slices. Add chopped cilantro to the bowl and stir to combine. Serve immediately or let marinate in the fridge before serving.
ingredients: 1 tbs. olive oil, extra virgin, unrefined and unfiltered, organic
1 pinch red pepper flakes, crushed, organic
sea salt, unrefined, & fresh ground pepper, organic to taste
